sources.name: The archives of French eighteenth century trade

resources.name: classifications_index
resources.description: This table list the classifications available to agregate country and product. It describes the hierarchy of classification which one beeing based on another one. The index does not contain the classification data which are in dedicated files whose name are standardized as base/classification_{model}_{slug}.csv. Those files are not in the datapackage because their structure moves with scientists usage...

fields.name: slug
fields.description: classification slug name used to uniquely identify the classification. The slug is used as variable name in classification tables.

fields.name: model
fields.description: The type of object which are classified. It's the data field in the flow resource which is targeted by the classification.

fields.name: parentSlug
fields.description: Slug of the parent classification. Left blank for the source which are the root of classification tree.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Human readable name of the classification
